title: Brave Frontier - Bakuen Max! Vargas Senki
alternative_title: Brave Frontier Bakuen Max! Vargas Senki ; Brave Frontier: Flames to the MAX! Vargas Chronicles ; ブレイブ フロンティア爆炎MAX！ ヴァルガス戦記
status: Brave Frontier Bakuen Max! Vargas Senki ; Brave Frontier: Flames to the MAX! Vargas Chronicles ; ブレイブ フロンティア爆炎MAX！ ヴァルガス戦記
description:
Description :
        This manga follows the flame swordsman Vargas in his younger days before he became one of the Six Heroes. He aspires to become the strongest swordsman in Grand Gaia and become a legend. See a different side of the heroes of old through this exciting adventure! Based on the mobile RPG game Brave Frontier. Original serialized in Dengeki Bazooka.
